|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-MT1300 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Beryl) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2021/01/03 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gl.inet/gl.inet_gl-mt1300 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-MT1300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q256JVFQ; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:83:C4 |oui = 94:83:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 5.0.0.0; |stockos = Linux;5.10.176;OpenWrt 22.03.4;
|exp_if_types = microSD, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.2, DBDC, 256QAM, Wave2, heatsink |addchip = BLE 4.2 SoC With Audio;Telink Semiconductor;TLSR8251F512ET24;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GL-MT1300-XXX, GL-MT1300-XXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = ^GL-MT1300-[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Guanglianzhitong Tech |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/21/2020 |estreldate = 11/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAG7MK4H8251 |asin = B08MKZXGBY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615D; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 ==Overview== }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MT1300-V1.1" is silk-screened on board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz :SoC: Dual-core ([[MIPS 1004Kc]]) *Storage: 32MB Dual/Quad SPI Flash, :TF card/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR3L) RAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7615DN :802.11abgn/ac Dual Band (2.4/5GHz) :2×2 2.4GHz + 2×2 5GHz *Network: 3x 1GbE (LAN) ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://docs.gl-inet.com/router/en/4/user_guide/gl-mt1300/ Docs] *[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official forum] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/gl.inet/gl-mt1300_v1 OpenWrt Device Page]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.zdnet.com/product/gl-inet-beryl-travel-router/ ''GL.iNet Beryl travel router review'' on '''ZDNET'''] *[https://the-gadgeteer.com/2021/01/19/gl-inet-gl-mt1300-beryl-pocket-sized-travel-router-review/ ''GL-iNet GL-MT1300 Beryl pocket sized travel router'' on '''The Gadgeteer''']
